plots.content: Another continuation of shattered logic (plot #367) using more organized bricks to represent Inktober's prompt "DODGE". The idea is that something dodged through the bricks and shattered them on its way.
Reinterpretation of last year's shattered square (plot #367) using the new filling technique explored recently.
Reinterpretation of last year's shattered square (plot #367) using the new filling technique explored recently.

Recursively slicing polygons.

Entry for https://genuary.art/ Jan.5 "Destroy a square."

A4 watercolor paper, fountain pen with Black ink.

data.title: Shattered square
